scripts.clean: pnpm -r exec rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.dev: concurrently --prefix-colors auto "pnpm --filter @monitoring/shared run dev" "pnpm --filter @monitoring/backend run dev" "pnpm --filter @monitoring/frontend run dev"
scripts.db:migrate: pnpm --filter backend exec prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:seed: pnpm --filter backend exec prisma db seed
